hero.title: Citizenship by Investment & Residency by Investment Programs
hero.subtitle: Secure Your Future with a Second Passport or Golden Visa

intro.heading: Global Mobility and Secure Settlement
intro.description:
At Sweden Relocators, we help individuals and families secure their future with second passports and long-term residency rights through investment. For high-net-worth individuals, entrepreneurs, and global citizens, CBI and RBI programs open doors to visa-free travel, business expansion, family security, and international settlement opportunities.

Our experts manage the complete journey, from eligibility assessment and investment advisory to documentation, embassy liaison, and post-approval settlement support. Through our secure digital portal, clients can track their cases, store documents, and reuse information for future applications.

understanding.heading: Understanding CBI and RBI
understanding.intro: Two powerful pathways to global mobility and secure international settlement:

definitions.title: Citizenship by Investment (CBI)
definitions.description: A direct path to citizenship and a second passport in return for making a government-approved investment.

definitions.title: Residency by Investment (RBI) or Golden Visa
definitions.description: A long-term residency permit based on investment in real estate, funds, or businesses, with many programs leading to permanent residence or citizenship over time.

understanding.benefits: Both options give families access to global mobility, healthcare, education, financial planning advantages, and secure relocation opportunities.

countryPrograms.heading: Country Programs and Benefits
countryPrograms.intro: Below is a detailed breakdown of the leading countries offering CBI and RBI programs, including investment requirements, benefits, and family inclusion.

caribbean.heading: Caribbean Citizenship by Investment Programs
caribbean.intro: The Caribbean is the most popular region for fast-track second citizenship. These programs are known for their affordable entry points, quick processing (3–6 months), and strong passports offering visa-free access to Europe, the UK, and Asia.

countries.name: St. Kitts and Nevis
investmentOptions: USD 150,000 donation to the Sustainable Growth Fund
USD 200,000 real estate investment (resale allowed after 7 years)
benefits: Visa-free travel to 150+ destinations, including Schengen Area and the UK
Fastest CBI approvals (4–6 months)
No income or inheritance tax
Recognized as one of the most reputable Caribbean passports

countries.name: Dominica
countries.familyMembers: Spouse, children, dependent parents, and dependent siblings under 25
benefits: Visa-free access to 140+ countries
Affordable program with strong global acceptance
Citizenship passed to future generations
Popular with families due to inclusivity

countries.name: Antigua and Barbuda
investmentOptions: USD 100,000 donation for family of four
countries.familyMembers: Spouse, children, parents, grandparents, and siblings
benefits: Visa-free to 150+ countries
Allows large families under one application
Requires just 5 days residency every 5 years
Popular for multi-generational families

countries.name: Grenada
benefits: Visa-free to 145+ destinations including China
Only Caribbean passport with access to US E-2 Investor Visa
Strong option for entrepreneurs targeting US business entry

countries.name: St. Lucia
benefits: Visa-free to 140+ destinations
Affordable entry, flexible program options
Strong Caribbean passport with investment diversification

european.heading: European Residency by Investment Programs (Golden Visas)
european.intro: Europe remains one of the most attractive destinations for wealthy individuals looking for security, lifestyle, and access to the EU market. RBI programs in the EU provide residency rights, with many leading to permanent residence and citizenship.

countries.name: Portugal Golden Visa
investmentOptions: EUR 500,000 in funds or job creation
benefits: Residency in the EU with visa-free Schengen travel
Citizenship eligible after 5 years of residency
Access to healthcare and education
Attractive tax incentives for investors

countries.name: Greece Golden Visa
investmentOptions: EUR 250,000 property purchase (most affordable in Europe)
benefits: Residency rights without stay requirement
Path to citizenship after 7 years
Access to EU markets and Schengen travel
Strong real estate returns in tourism-driven regions

countries.name: Spain Golden Visa
benefits: Residency and Schengen mobility
Citizenship eligibility after 10 years
Strong property market in major cities
Access to top-tier universities and healthcare

countries.name: Italy Investor Visa
benefits: Residency rights in Italy and Schengen mobility
Attractive for entrepreneurs and business expansion
EU citizenship after 10 years

countries.name: Malta
benefits: Full EU citizenship within 12–18 months
Visa-free access to 180+ countries including US and Canada
One of the world's strongest passports

countries.name: Cyprus
benefits: EU residency within 6 months
Access to healthcare and education
Property market offers solid rental returns

countries.name: United Arab Emirates (Dubai, Abu Dhabi)
benefits: Tax-free residency
Access to global business hub
Luxury lifestyle and high-quality healthcare

countries.name: United States (EB-5 Visa)
investmentOptions: USD 800,000 in business projects creating jobs
benefits: US Green Card and path to citizenship
Access to American universities and healthcare
Strong investment returns in business projects

countries.name: Canada
investmentOptions: CAD 350,000–1,200,000 depending on program (Provincial Nominee Programs, Quebec Investor Program)
benefits: Permanent residency with direct path to citizenship
High standard of living and healthcare
Global business and education opportunities

countries.name: United Kingdom Investor Visa
investmentOptions: GBP 2 million in UK businesses or government bonds
benefits: Residency and citizenship within 5 years
Access to world-leading education and finance sectors

countries.name: Ireland Investor Visa
investmentOptions: EUR 1 million fund or enterprise investment
benefits: Residency in Ireland with strong EU links
English-speaking business hub
Path to citizenship after 5 years
